name: Radish
tagline: Autonomous coding loops with safety guardrails
description: Radish wraps autonomous AI coding sessions with blast radius control, auto-checkpoints, kill switches, and structured audit trails.

features.name: Blast Radius Control
features.description: Restrict which files and directories agents can modify

features.name: Auto-Checkpoints
features.description: Git commits at configurable intervals for easy rollback

features.name: Kill Switches
features.description: Automatic termination on violation or timeout

features.name: Structured Audit Trails
features.description: Every action logged in JSON format for review

features.name: Cost Limits
features.description: Stop before burning through API budget

features.name: Multi-Agent Support
features.description: Integration with Claude, Cursor, Aider, and more

target_users: Organizations requiring audit trails for AI operations
use_cases: Overnight feature development with safety nets
Autonomous bug fixing with rollback capability
